content.body: Yesterday’s AsyncContext breakout unfortunately failed to gather the participation of many stakeholders who we were trying to bring together for discussion. Are we going to have a replacement discussion during this week on the sidelines of TPAC? How is scheduling that going?
That's unfortunate. I had been planning to join but just couldn't make it work with the timezone offset. Will definitely try to make the next one.
Would’ve been good to have you but the real missing parties were the browsers. We will try to catch up with them on the sidelines somehow
content.formatted_body: Would’ve been good to have you but the real missing parties were the browsers. We will try to catch up with them on the sidelines somehow

content.body: There were a lot of other breakout sessions going on at the same time, and I don't blame anyone present at TPAC from not attending
I will blame everyone who couldn't join remotely because of the timezone /j
